intro.p: Consider the function given by the formula

content.p: Complete the data table below that gives five data points for the function.

outtro.p: The completed data table is shown below.

content.p: Create a large graph grid and clearly label the scale of its axes appropriately for your data. Then, plot these five points and sketch a line or curve through them that could represent the graph of this function.

image.description: Data points and possible graph of this function
